name: Filippo Valle
body:
# Welcome from Filippo

This is my window on the net!

##Contacts
You may contact me at [mail(at)fvalle.me](mailto:mail@fvalle.me)!

If you prefer this is my **secure address**: [filippo_valle(at)protonmail.ch](mailto:filippo_valle@protonmail.ch)!

When contacting me, feel free to use my **PGP key** avaiable at [http://pgp.mit.edu](http://pgp.mit.edu/pks/lookup?op=vindex&search=0xD99B5A4A7F2EDD81).

#Curriculum Vitae
[Click here](https://github.com/fvalle1/fvalle1.github.io/blob/master/CV-Filippo_Valle-EN.pdf) if you wish to **find my CV**

##Reference
Wish to **know more**?
Read this [interview](http://www.carnevaledellafisica.it/2014/11/dal-liceo-alla-facolta-di-fisica.html)!

##Projects
###Cosmic Rays
I made a project called *Analisi di raggi cosmici con Supercomputer* during High school.

Have a look [this is what I realised](https://github.com/fvalle1/fvalle1.github.io/blob/master/Tesina.pdf) and there are also [some slides](https://github.com/fvalle1/fvalle1.github.io/blob/master/Tesina-beam.pdf).

This work is referenced [here](http://www.istitutomoro.it/area-studenti-e-famiglie/esame-di-stato/esempi-di-tesine/analisi-di-raggi-cosmici-mediante-supercomputer/), and it is also on [Amazon](https://www.amazon.it/dp/B00N7J1690)!

###Photos
I really love **taking photos**, on [Flickr](https://flic.kr/ps/35x3u4) you may find picutures I took to subjects like our **moon**, stars and so on (Yep, I love **space!**)

###Diceware
I [contributed](http://www.taringamberini.com/it/diceware_it_IT/lista-di-parole-diceware-in-italiano/contributi/) to the italian version of **Diceware**.

Search [my profile](https://keybase.io/filippov) on **Keybase** there are some interesting things about me and the security of this page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
